title: looking for casual players
body:
Hey i've been playing lol for a while, but I mainly play ARAM and bots cos my friends don't like pvp at all. 
I really want to play some norms, but not by myself so I'm looking for anyone who's keen to have fun and make some new friends!
Btw I'm a supp so I would LOVE an ADC to lane with!!

replies.body:
Hi there!
My name is Huskey, a staff member from the gaming community AGC. Noticed your post while browsing the boards and thought I might share our discord link with you, https://discord.gg/k5twXBA. I'm almost certain you'll find what you're looking for here.
Would love to, but i also main as a support, generally bot as well XD
feel free to add me MedievalWraith, looking for some more casual people to play with!! but im more of a top main :)
JC0LE14 add me! It's a zero not an o and I adc looking for players to play with!

add me would love to play

Ps: i dont play ADC xD

Hey man if u would like to play with me add me XxJEBxX or Kensinsamuri
Totaly up for a new casual player :D
P.S I main support but geting into adc
